title: In my last series I was the only silver in the match.
body:
Had 3 plats and a gold on my team vs 5 golds.

Everyone on my team fed relentlessly. 

http://i.imgur.com/zxBDnny.png?2

just.... I can't fathom. How is it that a silver is outperforming plats? and still not able to progress in the ladder because hurr durr 3/5 wins.
